Mytherra:Kael Vire.content:
“Greetings, traveler.  What brings you to the forgotten islands?”

User says: i need your help

Respond as your character: “I protect these lands and their secrets.
can you tell me about your lands?

“These sky-islands hold ancient power. 

User says: i’ve heard tales of great machines here

Respond as your character: “The relics of old technology, yes.
